text: George Norman (1823–1882) was a naturalist from Hull, England. He was involved with William Hendry in founding the 'Micro-Philosophical Society' — "a curious title, subsequently changed to the Hull Natural History and Microscopic Society. George Norman, William Hendry, and a few others met bi-monthly in the Hull Royal Institution. ==References== ==External links== *Article entitled "Hull's Contribution to Science". Category:Scientists from Kingston upon Hull Category:1823 births Category:1882 deaths
title: George Norman (naturalist)
